column2: It has been twenty years since the events of the Hearth's Warming Day. The bonds of friendship formed in that cave cemented peace between the three tribes for a time. No good thing last forever, though. The founders are old, their lives not for much longer, and for all the good they did, it was not enough to end the bigotry between the races. The next generation still harbours hatred in their hearts. Worse yet, the ponies have trouble on the horizon as politics run their course in the Crystal Empire. Sombra, Lord Regent and uncle of the Crystal Empress has claimed himself the rightful Emperor and pressed his claim as such.
